title: Weekend 02 - Inbox Zero
description: An email triage assistant that suggests the next action you should take on each message.

title: Weekend 03 - Pixel Painter
description: A collaborative pixel art pad that lets friends sketch together live.

title: Weekend 04 - Habit Loop
description: Track daily habits with ASCII graphs and receive encouraging terminal nudges.

title: Weekend 05 - Quest Log
description: Turn your todo list into a game-like quest board complete with rewards.

title: Weekend 06 - Soundscape
description: Compose ambient noise blends to help you focus, each with a shareable link.

title: Weekend 07 - Feed Forge
description: Mash up RSS feeds and newsletters into one curated firehose.

title: Weekend 08 - Launch Loom
description: A showcase page that stitches every weekend project together.

title: Weekend 09 - Code Canvas
description: An interactive code playground with live preview and instant sharing.
